Detailed Description

Class for accessing GNUBLIN GPIO-Ports.

With the gnublin_gpio API you can controll the GPIO-Ports of the GNUBLIN Board

Definition at line 71 of file gpio.cpp.

int gnublin_gpio::pinMode ( int  pin,
std::string  direction 
)

Change the PinMode.

With this function you can set the pin as input or output.
This must be done before all other operations.

Hint: GPIO 4 can only be used as output.

Parameters
pinPin number to change the mode
directiondirection of the pin (OUTPUT, INPUT)
Returns
success: 1, failure: -1

int gnublin_gpio::unexport ( int  pin)

Removes the GPIO.

Removes the GPIO from the filesystem, after that, you cannot access the pin.

Returns
bool error_flag
